spec_data.Name: perl-AutoClass
spec_data.Description:
AutoClass is a Perl module to automatically define simple get and set
methods to automatically initialize objects in a (possibly multiple)
inheritance structure.
spec_data.Signature: RSA/SHA256, Fri 28 Jul 2017 07:16:21 AM EDT, Key ID f55e7430f5282ee4
spec_data.Summary: Automatically define classes and objects for Perl
